attributes.action: Allow UColitus & Chrons diagnosed sufferers a card for disabled parking & Toilet
attributes.additional_details: Hi this petition is for all sufferers with chronic bowel conditions, the painful side of this is bad enough but this also causes restrictions in peoples day to day life we are not asking for benefits just  a card with our photo on after diagnosis to allow us to park in a disabled space or to use a toilet to give us some freedom back please help all UC & Chrons sufferers - give us a reduced rate card not free this could change peoples lives in ways we used to take for granted please
attributes.background: I have had UColitus over 10 years please help sufferers get the option to buy a photocard to give us more freedom to do the little things, park outside in disabled bay to so we have access toilets, a key to use disabled toilets please listen we need your support just for every day things
